Post Content: AI in a Nutshell 1. Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) â€“ Theoretical AI that mimics human intelligence, capable of reasoning, learning, and self-improvement.2. Explainable AI (XAI) â€“ Ensures AI decisions are interpretable, bridging the gap between machine predictions and human understanding.3. Artificial Intelligence (AI) â€“ Technologies that enable machines to think, learn, and act like humans in various applications.4. Machine Learning (ML) â€“ AI systems that improve through experience, utilizing supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning techniques.5. Neural Networks â€“ Computational models inspired by biological brains, enabling pattern recognition and complex decision-making.6. Deep Learning â€“ Advanced ML using hierarchical networks to process vast data, powering AI applications like speech recognition and image analysis.7. Generative AI â€“ AI models that generate text, images, and other creative content, leveraging language models, transformers, and self-attention mechanisms.[Explore more in the post]If you found this helpful donâ€™t forget to save this for later and comment your thoughts.Join my newsletter or send me a DM "Newsletterâ€ for more posts like this.Follow Denis Panjuta on Linkedin : https://lnkd.in/eUHjTBUi
